reg_info.act_under: Race Tracks Tax Act   Loi de la taxe sur le pari mutuel

content.content: 1.  (1) A notice of objection required under section 24 of the Retail Sales Tax Act, as made applicable by section 11 of the Act, shall be in Form 1. (2) A notice of appeal required under section 25 of the Retail Sales Tax Act, as made applicable by section 11 of the Act, shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 983, s. 1. FORM 1 Race Tracks Tax Act NOTICE OF OBJECTION   FORMULE 1 Loi de la taxe sur le pari mutuel AVIS D’OPPOSITION   O. Reg. 647/91, s. 1. FORM 2 Race Tracks Tax Act   FORMULE 2 Loi de la taxe sur le pari mutuel   O. Reg. 647/91, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A notice of objection required under section 24 of the Retail Sales Tax Act, as made applicable by section 11 of the Act, shall be in Form 1.

(2) A notice of appeal required under section 25 of the Retail Sales Tax Act, as made applicable by section 11 of the Act, shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 983, s. 1.

FORM 1

Race Tracks Tax Act

NOTICE OF OBJECTION


FORMULE 1

Loi de la taxe sur le pari mutuel

AVIS D’OPPOSITION


O. Reg. 647/91, s. 1.

FORM 2

Race Tracks Tax Act


FORMULE 2

Loi de la taxe sur le pari mutuel


O. Reg. 647/91, s. 2.
